sentences.sContent: He was in a less jocular mood than usual.
sentences.sCn: 他的情绪不像平时那么诙谐了。

synos.tran: 爱开玩笑的；打趣的；滑稽的

remMethod.val: joc (看作joke， 笑话) + ular → 滑稽的； 诙谐的

trans.tranOther: If you say that someone has a jocular manner, you mean that they are cheerful and often make jokes or try to make people laugh
